title: How to Download Jump Force on Android

steps.title: Allow your Android to download apps from sources other than the Play Store.
steps.content: Allow your Android to download apps from sources other than the Play Store. You can read How to Install APK Files on Android for more information. To enable this feature, go to Settings > Apps > Special app access > Install unknown apps . Select your web browser app and enable "Allow from this source". While not required, it can be helpful to have a file manager app installed on your device to more easily access and view your downloaded APK file.

steps.title: Go to https://jumpforcemobile.club on your phone.
steps.content: Go to https://jumpforcemobile.club on your phone. You can use any browser to download the game on your phone. If you selected a specific browser to download from unknown sources, you'll need to use this browser now. This is the official site for the Jump Force app, but the APK is also available on other popular repositories such as APKCombo and APKPure.

steps.title: Tap DOWNLOAD ON ANDROID.
steps.content: Tap DOWNLOAD ON ANDROID . You'll see this next to the Google Play Store icon in a blue button. Tap Ok to continue downloading the APK file. If your download didn't start automatically, you can tap the click here text to start the download.

steps.title: Open the downloaded file.
steps.content: Open the downloaded file. Some browsers will show a notification at the bottom of the screen that your file has finished downloading. Click the file to open it.

steps.title: Tap Install.
steps.content: Tap Install . The file will make sure you want to install the APK before you can continue.

steps.title: Tap Open.
steps.content: Tap Open . When the APK is done installing, you can tap Open to launch the game.
